message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which is valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the value it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase now, you can acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings of $1,000 compared to the standard price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
